abstract: Oklahoma's Tulsa County Dist Atty Stephen Kunzweiler is delving further into circumstances involving Robert C Bates, volunteer reserve deputy who fatally shot unarmed man Eric C Harris; concerns were raised after revelations from 2009 internal inquiry that top brass in sheriff's office told subordinates to overlook fact that Bates lacked skills and training required for the job.
lead_paragraph: In a 2009 internal investigation into Robert C. Bates, the volunteer reserve deputy who this month shot an unarmed man, officers said that he was unqualified for his post, but that commanders told them to ignore those concerns.

headline.main: Training of Deputy in Tulsa Was Faulted in a Report
headline.print_headline: Training of Deputy Was Faulted in a Report

snippet: In a 2009 internal investigation into Robert C. Bates, the volunteer reserve deputy who this month shot an unarmed man, officers said that he was unqualified for his post, but that commanders told them to ignore those concerns.
